Dealing with TaskPrototypes¶

The TaskPrototype is the backbone of the .do module.

Let’s have a look:

class do.models.TaskPrototype(*args, **kwargs)[source]¶

The boilerplate for a Task. Every Task is based on a TaskPrototype.

Most tasks in the system will originate from this model’s generate_task method.

generate_task(universe, parent_task=None, projected=None)[source]¶

Generates a task family based on this prototype.

TaskPrototype Profile¶
